attributes.action: Don't ban the XL Bully Ban the Breeders and bad owner
attributes.additional_details: in 1991 the  government band pit bulls and that did not work pit bull are still out there and still being breed banning XL Bully's will not work XL bully's are mongrels they are not a specific breed which make almost impossibly to define
attributes.background: the  government should take stronger action against the breeders and irresponsible owners

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611
